from notebookutils import mssparkutils

# MANUALLY Delete the tables in Linked/Azure Data lake Storage/ls_storage/odw-harmonised/lib

# MANUALLY Delete the JSONs in Linked/Azure Data lake Storage/ls_storage/odw-harmonised/config/json_files/old

# MANUALLY Load the JSONs in Linked/Azure Data lake Storage/ls_storage/odw-harmonised/config/json_files/new

# Execute the "Run all" in this Notebook

# Delete old tables
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_secure_info_fact;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_diversity_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_disability_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_religion_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_sxo_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_work_schedule_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_contract_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_costcenter_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_hr_hierarchy_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_organisation_unit_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_payband_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_area_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_pins_location_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_position_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_specialism_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_payroll_area_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_leavers_dim;")
spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_harmonised_db.hr_employeegroup_dim;")

# Load structure for new tables
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/py_create_tables_new')

# Load previous views
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/sap-hr-views')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/sap-hr-views-historic')

# Builds employee DIMS
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_employee_fact')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_employee_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_contract_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_costcentre_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_OrganisationUnit_Dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_payband_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_personnelarea_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_personnelsubarea_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_PINS_location_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_position_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_employeegroup_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_payrollarea_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_Employee_HR_hierarchy_dim')

# Build full FACT table
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HIST/HIST_HR_Record_Fact')

# Builds protected characteristic DIMs
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_diversity_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_disability_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_religion_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_sxo_dim')
# Builds protected characteristic FACT
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_secure_info_fact')

# Builds hr DIMS
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_personnel_area_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_personnel_sub_area_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_contract_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_payband_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_position_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_pins_location_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_organisation_unit_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_costcenter_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employeegroup_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_payroll_area_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_work_schedule_dim')

mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employee_fact')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employee_dim')

mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_specialism_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_absence_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_leave_entitlement_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employee_hr_hierarchy_dim')

# Build full FACT table
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_record_fact')

# Add Leavers info to the three main tables
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employee_fact_for_leavers')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employee_dim_for_leavers')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_record_fact_for_leavers')

mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employee_leavers_dim')
